shortDescription: Symptoms and context of the problem in the perception of the stakeholders.
title: Problem perception

shortDescription: Description of symptoms, causes and consequences of a situation (IST).
title: Problem diagnosis

shortDescription: Analysis of indicators at a reference point in time, used for monitoring. Often before an intervention.
title: Baseline analysis

shortDescription: Taxation of a performance or situation.
title: Assessment

shortDescription: History of illness, complaints or other problems in the perception of a patient or client.
title: Anamnesis

shortDescription: Description of current processes involved with the question or perceived problems.
title: Process chart

shortDescription: What is lacking in a specific situation by someone or some group (GAP).
title: Needs

shortDescription: What the client wants to reach or improve in the middle and long term (SOLL).
title: Goal

shortDescription: Design criteria specifications that stakeholders demanded for the solution.
title: Requirements

shortDescription: Conditions, protocols, norms and regulations to be taken into account for the solution (SOLL).
title: Restraints

shortDescription: A list of actions that define the interactions between someoneâ€™ s tasks and a system, to define partial solutions.
title: Use case

shortDescription: Description of actors with an interest in the situation and solution, e.g.: client, users, investors, designers.
title: Stakeholder map

shortDescription: A global and preliminary image of a solution.
title: Idea

shortDescription: Design at system level that describes the structure and relations between components.
title: Outline design

shortDescription: Design at component level to elaborate and materialize the solution.
title: Detailed design

shortDescription: Direction of a solution or an advice to solve a particular problem or improve a  specific situation.
title: Solution scenario

shortDescription: Approach of designed actions, stimuli and means to change a  situation, attitude or behavior.
title: Intervention

shortDescription: A stepwise way with means and times to achieve a given goal.
title: Plan

reflectiveQuestions: How do you make it work?
shortDescription: Functional model to show the possible applications of the design solution to the stakeholders.
title: Demonstrator

reflectiveQuestions: How do you make it work?
shortDescription: A scale model or release of a product to test a concept before taken tot production.
title: Prototype

reflectiveQuestions: How do you make it work?
shortDescription: Bringing a plan into action regarding a new system, process, product, policy to achieve set goals.
title: Implementation

reflectiveQuestions: How do you make it work?
shortDescription: A realized partial solution for machine, software, building or other manufacture.
title: Unit

reflectiveQuestions: How do you make it work?
shortDescription: A treatment, performance, transaction interaction to a client, patient, audience, pupil or professional partner.
title: Action

reflectiveQuestions: How do you make it work?
shortDescription: A diverse product range, e.g.: code, unit, component, artwork, text, movie, software product, database, fashion, all types of tools.
title: Final manufacture

reflectiveQuestions: Doest it work? Is it accepted?
shortDescription: The check whether a design solution meets the requirements of the stakeholders.
title: Requirements check

reflectiveQuestions: Doest it work? Is it accepted?
shortDescription: Test whether the prototype or final product performs as agreed with the stakeholders.
title: Performance test

reflectiveQuestions: Doest it work? Is it accepted?
shortDescription: Evaluation of a product by testing it on users in test conditions or in real-life context.
title: Pilot

reflectiveQuestions: Doest it work? Is it accepted?
shortDescription: Analysis to determine the value of a result or process during and after implementation.
title: Evaluation

reflectiveQuestions: Doest it work? Is it accepted?
shortDescription: Analysis of indicators after an intervention, often combined with baseline measurement.
title: Post test

reflectiveQuestions: Doest it work? Is it accepted?
shortDescription: Analysis of measurements with calibrated instruments under controlled conditions.
title: Lab test
